import React, {useState} from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroupItem, Button, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour; const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e =>{ setCredentials(prev => ({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const handleClick = e=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(credentials); } return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating } ({reviews?.length})
{/* Booking Form start*/}
Information
{/* Booking Form end*/} {/* Booking bottom start*/}
${price} per Person
${price}
Service Charge
$10
Total
${price+10}
{/* Booking bottom End*/}
) } export default Booking
